trans-unit.source: Data retention and storage in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Data retention and storage in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Data collection, retention and storage in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Data collection, retention and storage in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: This article answers questions about the data collected by [Visual Studio Application Insights][start] and how it is processed and stored.
trans-unit.target: This article answers questions about the data collected by [Visual Studio Application Insights][start] and how it is processed and stored.

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is an Azure Service in Preview.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is an Azure Service in Preview.

trans-unit.source: While in Preview we are working towards protecting your data per the policies described in the [Azure Security, Privacy, and Compliance white paper](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=392408).
trans-unit.target: While in Preview we are working towards protecting your data per the policies described in the [Azure Security, Privacy, and Compliance white paper](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=392408).

trans-unit.source: How is data collected by Application Insights?
trans-unit.target: How is data collected by Application Insights?

trans-unit.source: Application Insights SDKs and agents that you combine with your application send data to the Application Insights service.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights SDKs and agents that you combine with your application send data to the Application Insights service.

trans-unit.source: The data is processed by the service to provide you with reports, alerts and other functionality.
trans-unit.target: The data is processed by the service to provide you with reports, alerts and other functionality.

trans-unit.source: This can include data that you choose to capture by using the API, for example in properties and custom events.
trans-unit.target: This can include data that you choose to capture by using the API, for example in properties and custom events.

trans-unit.source: How much data can be captured?
trans-unit.target: How much data can be captured?

trans-unit.source: **Per second**: Up to 500 data points per second per instrumentation key (that is, per application).
trans-unit.target: **Per second**: Up to 500 data points per second per instrumentation key (that is, per application).

trans-unit.source: For the free [pricing tier][pricing], the limit is 100 dp/s.
trans-unit.target: For the free [pricing tier][pricing], the limit is 100 dp/s.

trans-unit.source: There are three buckets which are counted separately:
trans-unit.target: There are three buckets which are counted separately:

trans-unit.source: [Exceptions](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md#track-exception), subject to a lower limit of 50/s.
trans-unit.target: [Exceptions](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md#track-exception), subject to a lower limit of 50/s.

trans-unit.source: All other telemetry (page views, requests, dependencies, metrics, custom events and web test results).
trans-unit.target: All other telemetry (page views, requests, dependencies, metrics, custom events and web test results).

trans-unit.source: **Monthly**: Between 5 and 15 million data points in each calendar month, depending on your [pricing plan](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/application-insights/).
trans-unit.target: **Monthly**: Between 5 and 15 million data points in each calendar month, depending on your [pricing plan](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/application-insights/).

trans-unit.source: Except for the free [pricing tier][pricing], you can buy additional capacity if you hit the limit.
trans-unit.target: Except for the free [pricing tier][pricing], you can buy additional capacity if you hit the limit.

trans-unit.source: A *data point* is an item of telemetry sent to the Azure portal about your app.
trans-unit.target: A *data point* is an item of telemetry sent to the Azure portal about your app.

trans-unit.source: [SDK modules](app-insights-configuration-with-applicationinsights-config.md) that automatically collect data, for example to report a request or crash, or to measure performance.
trans-unit.target: [SDK modules](app-insights-configuration-with-applicationinsights-config.md) that automatically collect data, for example to report a request or crash, or to measure performance.

trans-unit.source: [API](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md) `Track...` calls that you have written, such as `TrackEvent` or `trackPageView`.
trans-unit.target: [API](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md) `Track...` calls that you have written, such as `TrackEvent` or `trackPageView`.

trans-unit.source: [Availability web tests](app-insights-monitor-web-app-availability.md) that you have set up.
trans-unit.target: [Availability web tests](app-insights-monitor-web-app-availability.md) that you have set up.

trans-unit.source: The raw data from which charts in [metric explorer](app-insights-metrics-explorer.md) are aggregated.
trans-unit.target: The raw data from which charts in [metric explorer](app-insights-metrics-explorer.md) are aggregated.

trans-unit.source: Metric data such as performance counter data don't usually appear as individual points in metric explorer.
trans-unit.target: Metric data such as performance counter data don't usually appear as individual points in metric explorer.

trans-unit.source: Each web test result in an [availability](app-insights-monitor-web-app-availability.md) report.
trans-unit.target: Each web test result in an [availability](app-insights-monitor-web-app-availability.md) report.

trans-unit.source: User and session counts aren't included in the quota for pricing purposes.
trans-unit.target: User and session counts aren't included in the quota for pricing purposes.

trans-unit.source: How do I know how many data points my app is sending?
trans-unit.target: How do I know how many data points my app is sending?

trans-unit.source: Open Settings/Quota and Pricing to see the Data Volume chart.
trans-unit.target: Open Settings/Quota and Pricing to see the Data Volume chart.

trans-unit.source: Or in Metrics Explorer, add a new chart and select **Data point volume** as its metric.
trans-unit.target: Or in Metrics Explorer, add a new chart and select **Data point volume** as its metric.

trans-unit.source: Switch on Grouping, and group by **Data type**.
trans-unit.target: Switch on Grouping, and group by **Data type**.

trans-unit.source: How long is the data kept?
trans-unit.target: How long is the data kept?

trans-unit.source: Raw data points (that is, items that you can inspect in Diagnostic Search): between 7 and 30 days.
trans-unit.target: Raw data points (that is, items that you can inspect in Diagnostic Search): between 7 and 30 days.

trans-unit.source: Aggregated data (that is, counts, averages and other statistical data that you see in Metric Explorer) are retained at a grain of 1 minute for 30 days, and 1 hour or 1 day (depending on type) for at least 13 months.
trans-unit.target: Aggregated data (that is, counts, averages and other statistical data that you see in Metric Explorer) are retained at a grain of 1 minute for 30 days, and 1 hour or 1 day (depending on type) for at least 13 months.

trans-unit.source: What limits are there on different types of data?
trans-unit.target: What limits are there on different types of data?

trans-unit.source: Maximum of 200 unique metric names and 200 unique property names for your application.
trans-unit.target: Maximum of 200 unique metric names and 200 unique property names for your application.

trans-unit.source: Metrics include data send via TrackMetric as well as measurements on other data types such as Events.
trans-unit.target: Metrics include data send via TrackMetric as well as measurements on other data types such as Events.

trans-unit.source: [Metrics and property names][api] are global per instrumentation key not scoped to data type.
trans-unit.target: [Metrics and property names][api] are global per instrumentation key not scoped to data type.

trans-unit.source: [Properties][apiproperties] can be used for filtering and group by only while they have less than 100 unique values for each property.
trans-unit.target: [Properties][apiproperties] can be used for filtering and group by only while they have less than 100 unique values for each property.

trans-unit.source: After the unique values exceed 100, the property can still be used for search and filtering but no longer for filters.
trans-unit.target: After the unique values exceed 100, the property can still be used for search and filtering but no longer for filters.

trans-unit.source: Standard properties such as Request Name and Page URL are limited to 1000 unique values per week.
trans-unit.target: Standard properties such as Request Name and Page URL are limited to 1000 unique values per week.

trans-unit.source: After 1000 unique values, additional values are marked as “Other values”.
trans-unit.target: After 1000 unique values, additional values are marked as “Other values”.

trans-unit.source: The original value can still be used for full text search and filtering.
trans-unit.target: The original value can still be used for full text search and filtering.

trans-unit.source: The data is visible to you and, if you have an organization account, your team members.
trans-unit.target: The data is visible to you and, if you have an organization account, your team members.

trans-unit.source: It can be exported by you and your team members and could be copied to other locations and passed on to other people.
trans-unit.target: It can be exported by you and your team members and could be copied to other locations and passed on to other people.

trans-unit.source: What does Microsoft do with the information my app sends to Application Insights?
trans-unit.target: What does Microsoft do with the information my app sends to Application Insights?

trans-unit.source: Microsoft uses the data only in order to provide the service to you.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft uses the data only in order to provide the service to you.

trans-unit.source: Can it be stored somewhere else, for example in Europe?
trans-unit.target: Can it be stored somewhere else, for example in Europe?

trans-unit.source: The data is stored in Microsoft Azure servers.
trans-unit.target: The data is stored in Microsoft Azure servers.

trans-unit.source: For accounts in the Azure Preview Portal, account restrictions are described in the [Azure Security, Privacy, and Compliance document](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=392408).
trans-unit.target: For accounts in the Azure Preview Portal, account restrictions are described in the [Azure Security, Privacy, and Compliance document](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=392408).

trans-unit.source: For accounts in the Visual Studio Online Portal, the [Visual Studio Online Data Protection](http://download.microsoft.com/download/8/E/E/8EE6A61C-44C2-4F81-B870-A267F1DF978C/MicrosoftVisualStudioOnlineDataProtection.pdf) document applies.
trans-unit.target: For accounts in the Visual Studio Online Portal, the [Visual Studio Online Data Protection](http://download.microsoft.com/download/8/E/E/8EE6A61C-44C2-4F81-B870-A267F1DF978C/MicrosoftVisualStudioOnlineDataProtection.pdf) document applies.

trans-unit.source: Access to your data by Microsoft personnel is restricted.
trans-unit.target: Access to your data by Microsoft personnel is restricted.

trans-unit.source: We access your data only with your permission and if it is necessary to support your use of Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: We access your data only with your permission and if it is necessary to support your use of Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: Data in aggregate across all our customers' applications (such as data rates and average size of traces) is used to improve Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: Data in aggregate across all our customers' applications (such as data rates and average size of traces) is used to improve Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: Could someone else's telemetry interfere with my Application Insights data?
trans-unit.target: Could someone else's telemetry interfere with my Application Insights data?

trans-unit.source: They could send additional telemetry to your account by using the instrumentation key, which can be found in the code of your web pages.
trans-unit.target: They could send additional telemetry to your account by using the instrumentation key, which can be found in the code of your web pages.

trans-unit.source: With enough additional data, your metrics would not correctly represent your app's performance and usage.
trans-unit.target: With enough additional data, your metrics would not correctly represent your app's performance and usage.

trans-unit.source: If you share code with other projects, remember to remove your instrumentation key.
trans-unit.target: If you share code with other projects, remember to remove your instrumentation key.

trans-unit.source: Is the data encrypted in Application Insights servers?
trans-unit.target: Is the data encrypted in Application Insights servers?

trans-unit.source: Not inside the servers at present.
trans-unit.target: Not inside the servers at present.

trans-unit.source: All data is encrypted as it moves between data centers.
trans-unit.target: All data is encrypted as it moves between data centers.

trans-unit.source: Is the data encrypted in transit from my application to Application Insights servers?
trans-unit.target: Is the data encrypted in transit from my application to Application Insights servers?

trans-unit.source: Yes, we use https to send data to the portal from nearly all SDKs, including web servers, devices and HTTPS web pages.
trans-unit.target: Yes, we use https to send data to the portal from nearly all SDKs, including web servers, devices and HTTPS web pages.

trans-unit.source: The only exception is data sent from plain HTTP web pages.
trans-unit.target: The only exception is data sent from plain HTTP web pages.

trans-unit.source: Could Personally Identifiable Information (PII) be sent to Application Insights?
trans-unit.target: Could Personally Identifiable Information (PII) be sent to Application Insights?

trans-unit.source: Most standard telemetry (that is, telemetry sent without you writing any code) does not include explicit PII.
trans-unit.target: Most standard telemetry (that is, telemetry sent without you writing any code) does not include explicit PII.

trans-unit.source: However, it might be possible to identify individuals by inference from a collection of events.
trans-unit.target: However, it might be possible to identify individuals by inference from a collection of events.

trans-unit.source: Exception and trace messages could contain PII
trans-unit.target: Exception and trace messages could contain PII

trans-unit.source: Custom telemetry - that is, calls such as TrackEvent that you write in code using the API or log traces - can contain any data you choose.
trans-unit.target: Custom telemetry - that is, calls such as TrackEvent that you write in code using the API or log traces - can contain any data you choose.

trans-unit.source: The table at the end of this document contains more detailed descriptions of the data collected.
trans-unit.target: The table at the end of this document contains more detailed descriptions of the data collected.

trans-unit.source: Am I responsible for complying with laws and regulations in regard to PII?
trans-unit.target: Am I responsible for complying with laws and regulations in regard to PII?

trans-unit.source: It is your responsibility to ensure that the collection and use of the data complies with laws and regulations, and with the Microsoft Online Services Terms.
trans-unit.target: It is your responsibility to ensure that the collection and use of the data complies with laws and regulations, and with the Microsoft Online Services Terms.

trans-unit.source: You should inform your customers appropriately about the data your application collects and how the data is used.
trans-unit.target: You should inform your customers appropriately about the data your application collects and how the data is used.

trans-unit.source: Can my users turn off Application Insights?
trans-unit.target: Can my users turn off Application Insights?

trans-unit.source: We don't provide a switch that your users can operate to turn off Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: We don't provide a switch that your users can operate to turn off Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: However, you can implement such a feature in your application.
trans-unit.target: However, you can implement such a feature in your application.

trans-unit.source: All the SDKs include an API setting that turns off telemetry collection.
trans-unit.target: All the SDKs include an API setting that turns off telemetry collection.

trans-unit.source: My application is unintentionally collecting sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: My application is unintentionally collecting sensitive information.

trans-unit.source: Can Application Insights scrub this data so it isn't retained?
trans-unit.target: Can Application Insights scrub this data so it isn't retained?

trans-unit.source: Application Insights does not filter or delete your data.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights does not filter or delete your data.

trans-unit.source: You should manage the data appropriately and avoid sending such data to Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: You should manage the data appropriately and avoid sending such data to Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: The SDKs vary between platforms, and there are are several components that you can install.
trans-unit.target: The SDKs vary between platforms, and there are are several components that you can install.

trans-unit.source: (Refer to [Application Insights - get started][start].) Each component sends different data.
trans-unit.target: (Refer to [Application Insights - get started][start].) Each component sends different data.

trans-unit.source: Classes of data sent in different scenarios
trans-unit.target: Classes of data sent in different scenarios

trans-unit.source: [Add Application Insights SDK to a .NET web project][greenbrown]
trans-unit.target: [Add Application Insights SDK to a .NET web project][greenbrown]

trans-unit.source: [Add AI Extension to Azure VM or Web App][azure]
trans-unit.target: [Add AI Extension to Azure VM or Web App][azure]

trans-unit.source: [Add Application Insights SDK to a Java web app][java]
trans-unit.target: [Add Application Insights SDK to a Java web app][java]

trans-unit.source: **Properties** on all standard and custom events
trans-unit.target: **Properties** on all standard and custom events

trans-unit.source: For [SDKs for other platforms][platforms], see their documents.
trans-unit.target: For [SDKs for other platforms][platforms], see their documents.

trans-unit.source: Any data - determined by your code
trans-unit.target: Any data - determined by your code

trans-unit.source: Id, IP, Locale, Device model, network, network type, OEM name, screen resolution, Role Instance, Role Name, Device Type
trans-unit.target: Id, IP, Locale, Device model, network, network type, OEM name, screen resolution, Role Instance, Role Name, Device Type

trans-unit.source: OS, locale, language, network, window resolution
trans-unit.target: OS, locale, language, network, window resolution

trans-unit.source: Machine name, locale, OS, device, user session, user context, operation
trans-unit.target: Machine name, locale, OS, device, user session, user context, operation

trans-unit.source: geo location from IP address, timestamp, OS, browser
trans-unit.target: geo location from IP address, timestamp, OS, browser

trans-unit.source: URL and page name or screen name
trans-unit.target: URL and page name or screen name

trans-unit.source: Type(SQL, HTTP, ...), connection string or URI, sync/async, duration, success, SQL statement (with Status Monitor)
trans-unit.target: Type(SQL, HTTP, ...), connection string or URI, sync/async, duration, success, SQL statement (with Status Monitor)

trans-unit.source: Type, **message**, call stacks, source file and line number, thread id
trans-unit.target: Type, **message**, call stacks, source file and line number, thread id

trans-unit.source: Process id, parent process id, crash thread id; application patch, id, build; exception type, address, reason; obfuscated symbols and registers, binary start and end addresses, binary name and path, cpu type
trans-unit.target: Process id, parent process id, crash thread id; application patch, id, build; exception type, address, reason; obfuscated symbols and registers, binary start and end addresses, binary name and path, cpu type

trans-unit.source: Processor time, available memory, request rate, exception rate, process private bytes, IO rate, request duration, request queue length
trans-unit.target: Processor time, available memory, request rate, exception rate, process private bytes, IO rate, request duration, request queue length

trans-unit.source: Web test response code, duration of each test step, test name, timestamp, success, response time, test location
trans-unit.target: Web test response code, duration of each test step, test name, timestamp, success, response time, test location

trans-unit.source: You can [switch off some of the data by editing ApplicationInsights.config][config]
trans-unit.target: You can [switch off some of the data by editing ApplicationInsights.config][config]

trans-unit.source: This product includes GeoLite2 data created by MaxMind, available from [http://www.maxmind.com](http://www.maxmind.com).
trans-unit.target: This product includes GeoLite2 data created by MaxMind, available from [http://www.maxmind.com](http://www.maxmind.com).
